import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Game } from 'src/app/models/game.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-game', templateUrl: './add-game.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-game.component.css'] }) export class AddGameComponent implements OnInit { addGameRequest: Game = { id: '', name: '', description: '', platform: '', imgurl: '' } constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }
